original_title: Soldier shoots himself at Panagoda Army Camp
original_body_lines: A soldier attached to the Panagoda Army Camp was killed after he shot himself with his service  firearm.
The deceased was identified as a 28-year old, a resident of Naula, Matale.
This soldier shot himself with his firearm in front of the 12th unit of the artillery regiment of the Panagoda army camp this evening.The army said the reason of the shooting is yet unknown.
